response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will be an asset to you. Considering its worth to both myself and potential buyers, I am offering this remarkable item to you at a special introductory price of $14,000. This is an opportunity to secure a high-quality product at a price that is significantly below its market value, making it a wise investment for you. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of bringing this product into your possession.", "product_price": 14000}
